DOC.criteria: The ability understand sign write informed consent form , prior participation screening procedure must willing comply study requirement Male nonpregnant , nonlactating female Between 18 65 year , inclusive Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 35 kg/m2 , inclusive .
